name: Study Hacks Corner
des1: This is the website of a teacher who teaches various subjects to his students online.
des2: On this website, students can enroll in various subjects of their choice
des3: Here students must sign in before enrolling in the course.
des4: Here users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google
des5: Here users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google
des6: Users data is secure by Json Web Token. There is no fear of information being stolen.

name: Tools Hunter
des1: This is the website of a tool manufacturing company that makes various tools and provides them to dealers.
des2: This company can manage products and orders and collect digital payments from customers.
des3: After Signing in, the user can place an order and view his dashboard, where he can confirm this order.
des4: After Order, users can review the service, which is automatically displayed on the home page.
des5: Users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google.
des6: Users data is secure by Json Web Token. There is no fear of information being stolen.

name: Fresh Fruits Warehouse
des1: This is a compact Warehouse Management application.
des2: This application provides different types of storing packages of fruits according to clients' demands.
des3: Here users can store their fruits by paying a reasonable rental fee.
des4: Authorized users of this application can deliver and restock fruits.
des5: Users can Sign Up and Sign in via email and password and directly Sign in through google.
des6: Users data is secure by Json Web Token. There is no fear of information being stolen.
